title: My Family's Pizza
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Pizzeria chain in Dallas area offering vegan faux meat toppings like soyrizo, bacon, cheese, ground beef, pepperoni, sausage, chicken. Some locations also offer a vegan chicken parmesan dish. Formerly known as Pizza by Marco (same company).
